title: smarAmyaham sadA rAhum
sahitya:
smarAmyaham sadA rAhum sUrya candra vIkSyam vikrta deham


anupallavi

  surAsuram roga haram sarpAdi bhIti haram shUrpAsana sukhakaram shUlAyudha dharakaram


caraNam    karALa vadanam kaThinam kayAnArNa karuNArdrA pangam caturbhujam khaDga kheTAdi dharaNan 
carmAdi nIla vastram gomedhakA bharaNam shani shukra mitra guruguha santoSa karaNam
